paper.title: Ensemble learning for portfolio valuation and risk management
paper.abstract: We introduce an ensemble learning method for dynamic portfolio valuation and risk management building on regression trees. We learn the dynamic value process of a derivative portfolio from a finite sample of its cumulative cash flow. The estimator is given in closed form. The method is fast and accurate, and scales well with sample size and path space dimension. It can also be applied to Bermudan options. Numerical experiments show good results for examples in dimensions 12 and 36.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用集成学习方法进行动态投资组合估值和风险管理，并特别提到了可以应用于Bermudan期权。这些内容明确涉及衍生品定价、金融风险管理和投资组合管理三个领域。
